description: Rod Daily and Cody Cummings are a couple of well-chiseled tough guys. Whether they're at the gym or chillin' back at Cody's place, they have that don't-fuck-with-me swagger. They do what they want. It just so happens that today, what Rod wants is to blow his hot load all over Cody!Yeah, working out sure can build up lots of stress in the body. Luckily these two pals are there to help each other work out the tension. Watch Cody get some blowjob therapy from from Rod as these boys recover from a hard workout. Enjoy!
title: Workout To Jerk Out
